articles.title: Future in Focus
articles.author: Wendi Douglas
articles.summary: Amazon curates a new releases page on its online marketplace. This page showcases some of the hottest products to go on sale in the last seven days.

articles.title: New Beauty Launches This Week From e.l.f. SKIN, Biossance and More!
articles.author: Victor Qunnuell Vaughns Jr
articles.summary: e.l.f. SKIN has launched the Vitamin C + E + Ferulic Serum, while Saint Jane Beauty introduced the Rich Rescue Phyto Mucin Cream. Velvé Skin released the Roasted Cacao Hydra-Soothe Gel Cleanser, Kopari Beauty launched the Ultra Restore Body Butter, and Olive & June partnered with Bubble to release Slam Dunk Your Mani Set. Also Biossance introduced Limited Edition Squalane + Omega Repair Cream.

articles.title: Microsoft Surface Laptop and Pro raise the price barrier for budget shoppers
articles.author: Nadeem Sarwar
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched updated Surface computing machines with a fresh design and lower prices. The Surface Pro and Laptop now start at $1,199.99 and $1,499 respectively. Entry-level Surface Pro and Laptop models have been removed from Microsoft's website, with the Surface Pro no longer offering a 256GB storage option.

articles.title: Food truck that appeared on Shark Tank hopes to expand to Nixa
articles.author: Lauren Inman
articles.summary: Cousins Maine Lobster is expanding its franchise to Nixa, Missouri, aiming to introduce its lobster rolls and seafood experience to areas where high-quality lobster is less accessible. The company is seeking franchise partners to drive the local rollout and plans to open 30 new locations this year.

articles.title: This Compact Travel Organizer Was Dubbed A 'Lifesaver'
articles.author: Marsha Badger
articles.summary: Amazon sells a product organizer that has pouches and is suitable for saving space and keeping products separated during travel. Customer reviews indicate the organizer is sturdy and useful for carrying toiletries. The pouches are velcroed and easily removable.

articles.title: SRx Health Solutions to start crypto-based borrowing plan, invests $1.5m in Solana
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: SRx Health Solutions, Inc. announced its intention to launch a new product.

articles.title: 30 Walmart Items To Make Life Easier As You Get Older
articles.author: Rachel Dunkel
articles.summary: Apple introduced AirPods Pro 2 featuring enhanced noise cancellation. BuzzFeed collaborated with Walmart to launch the Tasty cutting board prep station. Owala launched a new water bottle design with a wide lip, combining straw and no-straw features.

articles.title: I tested the viral Ninja Swirl by Creami. Here's what I thought about the soft-serve ice cream maker
articles.author: Rachel Dennis
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Creami Swirl, a new ice cream machine that allows users to make soft serve ice cream and other frozen treats at home.  The Creami Swirl features a soft serve function and multiple one-touch programs like Ice Cream, Frozen Yogurt, Milkshake, and Sorbet. It is priced at $350 and comes with two pint containers.

articles.title: How to Watch Samsung Unpacked Live on May 12
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to unveil the Galaxy S25 Edge, a mid-tier sub-model of the Galaxy S25, at an Unpacked event on May 12. The new phone will feature a 200-megapixel wide lens and incorporate Galaxy AI. The event will be streamed live on Samsung's YouTube channel and newsroom.

articles.title: Shake to Elevate Ignites Taste Buds with Two New Flavor-Forward, Salt-Free Dry Rubs
articles.summary: Shake to Elevate has launched two new dry rub blends: Guilt Free Dry Rub (No Sugar & No Salt) and Reserved Riot Dry Rub. These new flavors cater to distinct preferences and are available directly from the company's website, expanding the choices for health-conscious food lovers and culinary adventurers.

articles.title: Dysons don't have to cost a fortune. This V7 stick vacuum just dropped to $250
articles.author: Rikka Altland
articles.summary: The Dyson V7 Advanced cordless vacuum cleaner is currently on sale for $250 at Walmart and Dyson. This price matches its all-time low and offers superior cleaning tech at Dyson's most affordable price. The V7 Advanced features a Motorbar cleaner head with hair removal vanes and a fully-sealed filtration system.

articles.title: Blend Extra: Discover Essential Tips for a Spring Home Refresh!
articles.summary: Lysol promotes its solutions for deep cleaning during spring, targeting dirt and germs. ScotchBlue encourages DIY home projects using its products. Both Lysol and ScotchBlue invite consumers to visit their respective websites (lysol.com and scotchblue.com) for more information.

articles.title: Google Maps Can Now Use AI to Scan Your Photos for Places
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Google Maps has introduced a new feature for iPhones that uses Gemini capabilities to identify places in screenshots and save them to a list, aiding in travel planning. Users can access the feature within the Google Maps app by navigating to the 'You' tab and uploading screenshots.

articles.title: Above the Crib: An AU Parent's Guide to Choosing the Perfect Baby Mobile for Soothing and Stimulating Your Little One
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: Baby Cot Mobile AU introduces a new series of baby mobiles designed for Australian nurseries. The series includes a Soft and Calming mobile for peaceful sleep, a High-Contrast Newborn mobile, a Nature Sound mobile, and an Eco-Friendly Woodland mobile. These mobiles feature various designs, materials, and safety features catering to different developmental stages and preferences.

articles.title: Mother's Day 2025: Last-minute Gift Ideas To Make Your Favourite Woman Feel Special
articles.author: Akanksha Arora
articles.summary: Several companies and their products, like Chanel's N'5, YSL's Libre, and Lancôme's Idole in fragrances, Kaya skincare and Lancôme Genifique in skincare, and Dyson Airwrap in hair tools, are suggested as potential Mother's Day gifts. These recommendations aim to provide thoughtful options across various categories, highlighting both affordable and luxurious choices.

articles.title: MildSoaps.com Challenges Industry Norms With Fragrance-Free Soaps
articles.summary: MildSoaps.com introduces a line of unscented mild soaps made from 100% natural, biodegradable ingredients like olive oil, coconut oil, castor oil, and shea butter. These hypoallergenic, paraben-free bars are designed for sensitive skin, eczema, and allergies, and are packaged in biodegradable materials, offering gentle cleansing without harsh chemicals.

articles.title: On Sale: Under $700 for 16″ Dell Inspiron Touchscreen Laptop with i7, 16GB RAM
articles.author: Jessica Fritsch
articles.summary: Dell is offering the Inspiron 16 Touchscreen Laptop with Core i7, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD for $699.99, which is $300 off its usual price. This laptop features a 16-inch 2.5K resolution screen, ComfortView Plus, backlit keyboard, precision touchpad, aluminum case, and comes with trials for Microsoft 365 and McAfee+ Premium.

articles.title: Big Update in DreamVid V1.2.0: New AI Tech Makes Anyone a Co-Star in Your Video
articles.summary: iMyFone DreamVid has launched a new feature called 'Come to Life' as part of its V1.2.0 update. This technology uses AI to animate characters from photos and integrate them into videos. The updated DreamVid platform also offers additional creative features, aiming to simplify AI content creation.

articles.title: David Beckham spotted in central London at flagship store
articles.author: Holly Brencher
articles.summary: Nespresso launched its flagship boutique in Covent Garden, debuting the "Summer Spritz," a new iced coffee cooler made with Nespresso's Coffee+ Active blend. The beverage, mixed with Sicilian lemonade and honey, is served exclusively at the Covent Garden boutique for a limited time.

articles.title: Accelerate Adobe Solutions with IBM Consulting – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Riyadh Air launched its website, www.riyadhair.com, in under two months using Adobe Experience Manager and deployed Real-Time CDP, Journey Optimizer, Customer Journey Analytics, and Workfront in just three months. The company activated digital media campaigns in only three weeks, illustrating the rapid implementation and tangible business outcomes achieved through the integration of AI and Adobe solutions.

articles.title: No sheet! These wool dryer balls last 1,000 loads: A 6-pack is $10 for a few hours
articles.summary: Handy Laundry has launched Wool Dryer Balls as an alternative to dryer sheets, available on Amazon for $10 for a six-pack for a limited time. These wool dryer balls are reusable for over 1,000 loads and made of 100% New Zealand premium wool.

articles.title: 10Web aims to take AI website building to the next level with new API
articles.author: Sead Fadilpašić
articles.summary: 10Web has launched its AI Website Builder API, a tool allowing developers to create fully-functional websites from text input, hosted on WordPress. The API-generated websites are customizable, e-commerce ready, and hosted on 10Web's infrastructure. This new API utilizes proprietary technology developed before generative AI went mainstream.

articles.title: KitchenAid's new juicer and food chopper will eliminate the tangle of cords in your cupboards
articles.author: Cat Ellis
articles.summary: KitchenAid launched a new citrus juicer and a mini food chopper as additions to their cordless KitchenAid Go series. These appliances are part of the KitchenAid Go system, utilizing the same swappable battery, aiming to reduce kitchen clutter.

articles.title: My Hunt for the Perfect Red Sock
articles.author: Emily North
articles.summary: Sandy Liang offers red socks with its 'SL' logo. Intimissimi's red socks are described as unsatisfactory. Comme Si features Merino Socks made from wool and nylon, available in Maraschino color. Finally the unnamed brand launches 'the perfect red sock' for its quality and design.

articles.title: Miss real social media? Syrup promises connection without the chaos
articles.author: North Shore News
articles.summary: Lodestar Media has soft-launched a new social media platform named Syrup. Syrup is presented as free from algorithms, ads, bots, and data tracking.

articles.title: Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 Aura Edition: The AI-enhanced Yoga laptop Is HERE!
articles.summary: Lenovo is launching the Yoga Slim 7 Aura Edition laptop. The laptop has a streamlined design, ultra-slim profile and powerful specs. The product features display, AI features, build quality, and real-world usage.

articles.title: Violife becomes top dairy-free cheese brand
articles.author: CM Staff
articles.summary: A company launched reformulated mozzarella and cheddar shreds. The new product provides better flavour, melting, and stretching performance.

articles.title: Olam Agri Introduces Crown Thick Spaghetti: A Delicious New Twist on a Classic Favourite
articles.author: Pulse Mix
articles.summary: Crown Flour Mill (CFM) Limited, a subsidiary of Olam Agri in Nigeria, has launched Crown Thick Spaghetti, a new product designed to meet consumer demand for thick-strand spaghetti. The launch event in Abuja showcased the product's versatility and the company's commitment to providing high-quality, nutritious food options in Nigeria.

articles.title: Google Ads AI Max: Automation with a side of anxiety
articles.author: Anu Adegbola
articles.summary: Google has announced AI Max, a new suite of automation features for Search campaigns. This new feature aims to enhance performance but has generated mixed reactions from advertisers, with concerns about targeting control and suitability for specific industries. Advertisers are advised to test AI Max cautiously and monitor its performance closely.

articles.title: Why Galaxy S25 Edge is the most exciting Samsung phone in years
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge on May 13, a slim phone with a curved screen design reminiscent of earlier models. It features Corning Gorilla Glass Ceramic 2 and a titanium chassis, and a 200-megapixel primary camera. The company has revealed limited information to generate buzz and anticipation for the new device.

articles.title: ChatGPT may be preparing to offer weekly or lifetime subscriptions for your AI fix
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: New subscription offerings are available for an AI bot. These are presented as an alternative to current subscription options.

articles.title: Nike's New V5 RNR Is the Star of Deichmann's Latest Campaign
articles.summary: Deichmann's is offering the Nike V5 RNR in four colorways. The product launch is part of the 'EXPECT THE UNEXPECTED' Spring 2025 campaign.

articles.title: Your window AC unit can only do so much—let these sweat-wicking sheets do the rest
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: A bamboo-blend sheet set is offered for $30.97 (reduced from $129). The sheet set, made from microfiber and bamboo fiber, is designed to wick away moisture, keep sleepers cool, and provide restful sleep. The set includes a fitted sheet, flat sheet, and four pillowcases, all made with hypoallergenic, lightweight, and plush fabric.

articles.title: People are only just realising the right and easy way to unwrap a lollipop after ‘so many years of teeth and frustration'
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Chupa Chups, founded in 1958 and now owned by Perfetti Van Melle, had its logo designed by Salvador Dali in 1969. The brand initially targeted children but later launched anti-smoking campaigns in the 1980s with slogans like "Smoke Chupa Chups" and "Stop smoking, start sucking."

articles.title: Don't sleep on this TCL TV in 2025: This new Mini LED model gives OLED a close fight
articles.author: Chris Bayer
articles.summary: TCL's Mini LED TV model is available at a new low price.

articles.title: I've yet to find a Lenovo laptop that delivers more power, battery, and comfort than this
articles.author: Cesar Cadenas
articles.summary: Lenovo's Yoga 9i 2-in-1 Aura Edition, a new laptop with AI-enhanced features, is now available for purchase. The 'Aura Edition' incorporates AI features like Aura Smart Share for seamless file transfer between smartphones and the laptop, and Smart Modes for posture checks and device security.

articles.title: Aldi makes sushi deal with Irish manufacturer
articles.author: Millicent Machell
articles.summary: Oishii Foods is launching its sushi products in Aldi Ireland's 163 stores this month. The sushi will include ingredients such as surimi and tiger prawns.

articles.title: Lenovo unleashes Tai Chi-performing humanoid robot at Shanghai event
articles.author: Aman Tripathi
articles.summary: Lenovo introduced its first humanoid robot, LeXiang No.1, at Tech World 2025, positioning it as a future 'silicon employee.' The robot features a sophisticated three-layered architecture and is slated for deployment in eldercare and healthcare sectors. Lenovo's enterprise intelligence strategy powers this intelligent agent, leveraging a four-layer 'device-edge-cloud-network' architecture.

articles.title: Ditch your sagging bed! Save $300 on the new Sleepy's by Sealy Hybrid HD Firm Mattress 👀
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: The Hybrid HD Firm Mattress, featuring individually wrapped coils and ViscoBoost HD memory foam, offers responsive support and pressure relief. It promotes spinal alignment and reduces tossing and turning and also regulates temperature. Anti-Sag technology is used to resist body impressions.

articles.title: 8 Best Robot Vacuums (2025): Tested & Reviewed in Real Homes
articles.author: Adrienne So
articles.summary: Roborock's 2024 flagship vacuum, the Qrevo Curv, is highly regarded. Eufy offers the Mach S1 Pro, featuring a unique design and ozone generator, and the X10 Pro Omni as a hybrid robot vacuum mop. The Dreame L40 Ultra, a robot vacuum-mop combo, debuted at IFA 2024, offering a cheaper alternative to the Dreame X30 Ultra.

articles.title: 51 Mundane Products That Are Basically Life Changing
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Built introduces "Puff Protein Bars," chocolate-covered marshmallows with 17 grams of protein. Medicube launches "Zero Pore" Pads, Korean skincare pads with lactic and salicylic acid. PanOxyl releases Antimicrobial Hydrating Acne Creamy Wash, designed for sensitive skin and acne prevention. Tineco offers a 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop with separate tanks for clean and dirty water.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans rushing to buy game-changing garden tool with multiple uses in middle aisle and it costs just €24.99
articles.author: Hannah Keegan
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland is launching a new electric weed killer for €24.99, featuring multiple nozzles and environmentally friendly operation. Additionally, they are introducing a new wooden garden day bed as part of their 2025 summer launch, offering a versatile seating arrangement and compact size suitable for various gardens. Both items are expected to be popular with customers, with limited stock available.

articles.title: How to skip ‘AI Overviews' on Google Search with this simple trick for clean results
articles.author: MD Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy F56 in India with a slim design, offering specific features and specifications. The article also anticipates the potential launch of the Vivo X200 FE in India around July, providing expected details on its specs, features, and price.

articles.title: Mall launches AI-powered cleaning robots
articles.author: Mariah Doksil
articles.summary: Centre Point Sabah has launched two new AI-powered cleaning robots, Chuppy and Chippy, making it the first shopping mall in Sabah to do so. These robots can mop, scrub, sweep, and vacuum, minimizing water usage and chemical waste while enhancing the mall's cleaning team's effort.

articles.title: 42 Products With Such Remarkable Results You'll Be Like "Oh, Cool, Witchcraft"
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder for oil absorption and pore blurring. The Pink Stuff released a new "Sqeezy" sponge set for tough cleaning projects. Olay launched a Super Serum Body Wash, packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Clinique is promoting Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm. E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. Biodance launched Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask.

articles.title: Figma's world is growing fast
articles.author: Harry McCracken
articles.summary: Figma recently announced several new products: Figma Make, which turns prompts into AI-generated code; Figma Sites, for constructing and hosting websites; Figma Buzz, for creating marketing assets with AI assistance; and Figma Draw, for creating vector illustrations. These new products support Figma's focus on turning raw concepts into shippable software.

articles.title: Mzansi's best just got better: Honor 400 Lite picks up the torch from SA's No.1 selling smartphone
articles.author: Honor South Africa
articles.summary: Honor is preparing to release the Honor 400 Lite, the successor to the popular Honor 200 Lite. The Honor 400 Lite is expected to build on the previous model's success with improvements in cameras, screen brightness, and AI features. The launch follows Honor's significant sales growth in South Africa.

articles.title: Mother's Day: Essential skincare is a perfect gift
articles.author: Prothom Alo English Desk
articles.summary: The Body Shop is promoting three skincare products, Skin Defence Multi-Protection Light Essence SPF 50 PA+++, Tea Tree Skin Clearing Facial Wash, and Vitamin E Moisture Cream. The products are highlighted for their protective, cleansing, and hydrating properties, respectively, emphasizing their benefits for Mother's Day.

articles.title: China's Xueersi launches new smart learning tablet with dual AI model
articles.author: 董欣怡
articles.summary: Xueersi, a Chinese education technology firm, launched new smart learning devices including the P, S, and T series. These devices feature enhanced AI capabilities and expanded educational content, integrating the Jiuzhang model with DeepSeek for personalized learning experiences. The Jiuzhang model is among the first education-focused LLMs approved by Chinese regulators.

articles.title: Arby's customers aren't impressed with its new menu item: 'I wouldn't even try it for free'
articles.author: EMMA SALETTA
articles.summary: Arby's launched Steak Nuggets nationwide, available as a 5 or 9-piece bowl and in a Steak Nugget Sandwich, served with hickory barbecue sauce. McDonald's tested a McVeggie sandwich in Canada, Burger King tested Nacho Chicken Fries in Columbus, Ohio, and Chipotle had success with its limited-edition honey chicken after testing it last year.

articles.title: BIZ BUZZ: Ayala Land in talks to take over New World hotel
articles.author: Share:
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz has launched two new plug-in hybrid vehicles: the E-class sedan and the GLC SUV. These luxury vehicles combine electric power and gasoline, offering a more eco-friendly driving experience for environmentally conscious consumers.

articles.title: Primark fans snap up new £6 'Santorini Sunsets' beauty bundle
articles.author: Amber O'Connor Money
articles.summary: Primark has launched new £6 mini beauty sets from their 'Santorini Sunsets' collection, which include travel-sized items like lip balm, body lotion, and body spray. These sets are designed for holiday-goers and those interested in trying new beauty products and are available in Primark stores.

articles.title: Primark's £6 'Santorini Sunsets' beauty set rivals Sol de Janeiro
articles.author: Amber O'Connor Money
articles.summary: Primark has launched new £6 mini beauty sets featuring travel-sized items, including lip balm, body lotion, and body spray from the 'Santorini Sunsets' collection. These sets are targeted towards holiday-goers or those interested in trying new products, and are being promoted via social media platforms like TikTok.

articles.title: Samsung's Super Thin Galaxy S25 Edge Launch Draws Closer, But Can it Beat Apple's iPhone 17 Air?
articles.author: Jose Enrico
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its Galaxy S25 Edge phone on May 12th. The new phone is anticipated to be ultra-thin with AI-driven performance, positioning it as a competitor to the rumored iPhone 17 Air.

articles.title: 7 simple tricks to boost your Android mobile phone's performance, battery
articles.author: MD Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy F56 in India with a slim design and is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, which could be the world's slimmest foldable phone. Vivo is also expected to launch the X200 FE in India in July, with details on specs, features, and price.

articles.title: Best fashion and beauty buys perfect for snapping up this weekend
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Neom launched the Wellbeing Pod Mini+ Diffuser, a waterless essential oil diffuser. Rodial introduced SPF Drops, a lightweight SPF product. Maria Nila launched Head & Hair Heal Beauty Bags featuring haircare products. Nike Swim released new swimwear pieces, including the Effortless Essential Triangle Bikini. Ariana Grande launched R.E.M. Cherry Eclipse Perfume and Burga launched the Café del Sur Phone Case collection. Nobody's Child launched Poppy Delevingne Crochet Juno Top

articles.title: Humza redesigns packs and rolls out premium Asian-inspired snacks
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Humza, a halal frozen food brand owned by Surya Foods, has launched a new 'Humza Signature' range of Asian-inspired snacks, including Aloo Paratha and Lahori Chicken Charcoal Seekh Kebabs.  The company is also rolling out refreshed packaging for its classic range, featuring a modernised logo and design to appeal to a wider audience.

articles.title: 365 Retail Markets Announces Modular Smart Store Combinations to Expand Operator Business Opportunities
articles.author: El Campo Leader-News
articles.summary: 365 has added new temperature, size, and age-verification options to its AI and Computer Vision product line. These additions represent an expansion of the company's existing product features.

articles.title: fans love Boden's 'feel so pretty' tea dress
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Boden's 'Ellie Flutter Maxi Tea Dress' is gaining popularity among shoppers, with a 4.5-star rating and positive reviews highlighting its comfort, flattering fit, and available in six colors. The dress is priced at £112, with a 15% discount available using code PQ4D.

articles.title: If You Don't Have Any Of These 34 Useful Products, You're Sincerely Missing Out
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: Our Place introduced a personal blender with two high-speed modes, including a cup and lid for on-the-go use. Nori Press launched a portable pressing and steaming device that works without an ironing board. Bissell released a portable multi-purpose carpet cleaner with powerful spray and suction capabilities.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 Edge is very slim so Samsung made a special type of glass for it
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its slimmest Galaxy S series phone, the Galaxy S25 Edge, on May 13. The phone features Gorilla Glass Ceramic 2, a newly developed glass protection created with Corning. The S25 Edge is expected to run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and feature Galaxy AI tools.

articles.title: 1664 Blanc brings refined French flair to Romania – with a twist 'Oh là là' in every glass
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: Tuborg Romania has introduced a new 0.5L can for its 1664 Blanc beer, targeting the retail segment and complementing the existing bottle and draft options. This portfolio expansion is part of the brand's new 'Good Taste with a Twist' communication platform, aiming to enhance the brand's presence and appeal to Romanian consumers.

articles.title: Amazon's new AI robots with sense of touch 'could eventually do household chores'
articles.author: Chris Burn
articles.summary: Amazon has unveiled its new 'Vulcan' robots, equipped with AI, sensors, and a spatula-like gripping tool, for use in fulfillment centers. These robots are capable of handling around three-quarters of the products Amazon sells and are expected to be rolled out to UK distribution centers over the next three years. Amazon anticipates that the deployment of these robots will lead to job role changes rather than job losses.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3 teased to launch soon: Expected to debut with 6.5-inch OLED display, 120Hz refresh rate, AI updates, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Nothing is preparing to release the Nothing Phone 3, anticipated to launch in Q3, potentially as a replacement for the Nothing Phone (2). The new model is expected to include an AI-powered platform with breakthrough user interface innovations, possibly integrating the 'Essential Space' hub, and may feature a 6.5-inch OLED screen with a 120Hz refresh rate and either a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 or 8s Gen 3 chip.

articles.title: Anthropic brings AI web search to Claude's new API
articles.author: Anastasiia Kovalova
articles.summary: Anthropic has launched a new API for its Claude language models, enabling them to search the Internet and access up-to-date information. Developers can now use Claude for real-time data analysis, with the API costing $10 per 1000 searches and compatible with Claude 3.7 Sonnet, Claude 3.5 Sonnet, and Claude 3.5 Haiku. Anthropic also added a web search function to Claude Code, a tool for automating development tasks.

articles.title: These Dove Body Washes Will Give You Brighter, Softer Skin
articles.summary: Dove has introduced several new body washes, each designed for specific skin needs. These include the Deep Moisture Body Wash, Dryness Care Body Wash with Jojoba Oil, Refresh Body Wash with Cucumber & Green Tea, Sensitive Body Wash, Glow Recharge Body Wash with 3% Brightening Serum + Vitamin C, Hydration Boost Body Wash and Soothing Relief Body Wash. The products range in price and can be purchased from various retailers like Amazon and Rhema Beauty Shop.

articles.title: Aldi launches new range of sandals for £9.99 & they're real leather – the exact date they're hitting stores
articles.author: Rebecca Miller
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a new range of real leather sandals for adults priced at £9.99, available from May 15th, alongside kids' versions for £4.99. Additionally, Aldi is introducing a new summer clothing line for men and women, including Crinkle Top/Trouser sets, Shoulder Bags, and Men's Chino Shorts.

articles.title: Taobao and Xiaohongshu Team Up to Redefine Shopping Journey with Red Cat Initiative-钛媒体官方网站
articles.summary: Taobao Tmall and Xiaohongshu have launched a strategic partnership called the "Red Cat Initiative," featuring a new "Ad Link" that allows brands in a pilot program to directly channel users to Taobao Tmall, shortening the path to purchase. Mogujie is also working with Xiaohongshu to refine backend functionality and operational strategies for brands and influencers.

articles.title: Nippon Paint unveils new Weatherbond Quartz Series
articles.summary: Nippon Paint has launched the Weatherbond Quartz series in the Philippines. This premium line of exterior paints is designed to withstand harsh elements and provide long-term durability for Filipino homes and buildings. The Weatherbond Quartz series incorporates technologies like Quartz Technology, Keep Clean Technology, Sunblock Technology, Fibra Technology, Micro Block Technology and Color Care Technology.

articles.title: New Look's 'gorgeous' red summer midi dress with pockets that 'looks and feels great'
articles.author: Mel King Content Editor
articles.summary: New Look is promoting its red puff sleeve midi dress, priced at £29.99, which features pockets, ruching, and comes in multiple colors. Similar dress styles are available at Next for £42 and Boohoo for £15.60 (on sale).

articles.title: New Look's 'gorgeous' red summer dress with pockets that 'looks and feels great'
articles.author: Mel King Content Editor
articles.summary: New Look is generating excitement with its 'red puff sleeve midi dress' priced at £29.99, which features useful pockets and comes in multiple colors. Customers are praising the dress's flattering design, although some note that the sizing runs slightly large. Similar styles are also available from Next (£42) and Boohoo (£15.60).

articles.title: Kia still mulling hybrid, EV power for Tasman ute
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: Kia Global developed the Tasman and is focusing on markets where it can achieve respective business plans. Kia expects to evaluate the need to sustain or grow the product in coming years.

articles.title: Bulldog Skincare's new SPF moisturiser already has over 100 five-star reviews
articles.author: Laura Hampson
articles.summary: A new moisturizer with SPF 50 features a light texture and quick absorption, leaving no greasy feel or white cast. User experience highlights skin softening and improved health after one week of use, making it a smart choice for hydration and sun protection.

articles.title: BYD enters Romanian market with electric and hybrid models
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: BYD has launched its full-electric and plug-in hybrid models in Romania, including the SEALION 7, a high-performance electric SUV with a range of up to 502 km. The company plans to expand its network to over 30 sales points by the end of 2025 and has partnered with UniCredit Leasing to support financing and distribution.

articles.title: Discover The Comfort And Style Of Pink Palm Puff Hoodie Fashion
articles.summary: Pink Palm introduces the Puff hoodie, a product focusing on comfort and modern streetwear. The hoodie is made of high-quality materials and is available in multiple colors and styles that change with the seasons. The product is available online and in selected stores.

articles.title: Smart showcases 5G Standalone technology at j-hope's concert
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: Smart Communications showcased its 5G Standalone (SA) technology, offering prioritized network experience and optimized network infrastructure. Smart also launched Smart 5G Max and TNT '5G Max', providing customers with a seamless mobile experience, and also launched TNT Max Saya 30, a prepaid data pack with a prioritized network. The Smart 5G Max helped users to communicate and post on social media platforms without lags.

articles.title: Google AI Max and SEO: What it means for brands and consumers
articles.author: https://www.campaignindia.in
articles.summary: Google's AI Max for Search is a new product that signals a shift in information retrieval and usage. The tool presents new challenges for marketers and brands.

articles.title: Samsung reveals Galaxy S25 Edge details ahead of launch
articles.author: Stan Schroeder
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its new Galaxy S25 Edge phone at the Samsung Unpacked event on May 12 at 8 p.m. ET. The tagline for the event is "Beyond slim," suggesting the phone will be super-slim.

articles.title: Super-shopper helping Black Country and Staffordshire shoppers to bag beauty treats
articles.author: Deborah Hardiman
articles.summary: Aldi is seeking beauty influencers to join its Beauty Club to test and review new Lacura products before they are launched. This initiative aims to gather customer feedback and insights to improve and innovate the Lacura range.

articles.title: Razer announces travel-sized Basilisk Mobile mouse with dedicated AI prompt key alongside ultra-low-profile portable Joro keyboard
articles.author: Hope Corrigan
articles.summary: Razer has launched the Basilisk Mobile mouse and the Joro keyboard, targeting portability and ergonomics. The Basilisk Mobile mouse shares DNA with the Basilisk V3 series, features the Razer Focus X 18K Optical Sensor, and offers HyperScroll Technology. The Joro Keyboard is an ultra-low-profile 60% board with gamer-focused features and Razer Snap Tap tech, and is compatible with both PC and Mac, with the mouse priced at $100 USD and keyboard priced at $150 USD.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 10 India launch date announced: Confirmed to debut with Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC, 2 colours, SuperComputing Chip Q1, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: iQOO Neo 10 is launching in India on May 26, fueled by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 and Supercomputing Chip Q1. It features a 7,000mAh battery with 120W cable charging, a dual-tone design in Inferno Red, and a Titanium shade option. The phone will be available on Amazon.in, iQOO.com, and physical retail outlets.

articles.title: Nutanix escapes the datacentre with Cloud Native AOS
articles.author: Antony Adshead
articles.summary: Nutanix has launched Cloud Native AOS, an operating system that underlies its HCI products. This new offering allows customers to deploy the OS separately and without a hypervisor, enabling them to extend beyond core HCI deployments and roll out Kubernetes containerization on bare metal servers and Kubernetes runtimes in the cloud.

articles.title: DoubleVerify Launches Pre-Screen Safety and Suitability Solution for Google's Search Partner Network
articles.summary: DoubleVerify has launched a new pre-bid control solution for Google's Search Partner Network (SPN). This product allows advertisers to apply DoubleVerify's brand safety and suitability protections to SPN inventory, ensuring alignment with brand preferences and improving media investment efficiency.

articles.title: Algolia Unveils Real-Time, Context-Aware AI Agents Across Salesforce and Adobe
articles.summary: Algolia has launched an AI agent that operates on real-time data across enterprises using Salesforce's Agentforce and integrates with Adobe Experience Manager, Adobe Experience Platform, and Salesforce Commerce Cloud. This AI-native search engine retrieves structured content from multiple customer datastores and assembles context-aware responses in real-time, bridging the gap between front-end agent platforms and back-end systems.

articles.title: Innovative Swiss Online Advertising Formats – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Yaleo Advertising has expanded its product portfolio by launching new video and interactive story formats, namely Yaleo Video and Yaleo Story. Yaleo Video delivers compelling messages through large-scale video ads, while Yaleo Story offers an interactive experience reminiscent of social media stories but hosted on premium news sites. These formats leverage the credibility of established media brands, and Yaleo Advertising launched these new offers in May, 2025.

articles.title: Fed up with irrelevant results cluttering up your Windows 11 searches? I certainly am, and it looks like the situation's going downhill from here
articles.author: Darren Allan
articles.summary: Microsoft is integrating the Microsoft Store with Windows Search in Windows 11. Users will be able to find and install apps directly from the Start menu or Taskbar search results. This feature is rolling out soon.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Corning Gorilla Glass Ceramic 2 Durability – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge featuring the new Corning Gorilla Glass Ceramic 2, designed for enhanced durability and sleekness. The launch event will be livestreamed on Samsung's YouTube channel on May 12, and reservations are open, offering a $50 Samsung credit.

articles.title: Snapchat supercharges Gen Z strategy with AI and new creative tools
articles.author: Frances Sheen
articles.summary: Snapchat is introducing new advertising products including Sponsored Snaps, which allows brands to deliver visual messages from creators or target based on performance. Also, Snapchat is launching AI-powered campaign tools like Smart Bidding and Smart Budget that will optimize ad spending. Furthermore, Snapchat has launched Under the Ghost, a live performance series aimed at engaging fans and providing branding opportunities.

articles.title: A Third-Party Nintendo Switch 2 Case Is Already On Sale for Only $13
articles.author: Myles Obenza
articles.summary: TZGZT offers an all-purpose travel case for the upcoming Nintendo Switch 2 launch on June 5th. The case features three-layer separation, ample storage for accessories, and slots for up to 10 game cartridges. It is currently available at a discounted price on Amazon.

articles.title: Jeddah launches expanded public transport bus network
articles.author: Arabian Business
articles.summary: Jeddah Buses launched its new mobile application on both Apple Store and Google Play.

articles.title: Samsung confirms big durability upgrade for Galaxy S25 Edge - and it's mostly good news
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge. The company has teased a specification of the new product.

articles.title: DoubleVerify Launches Pre-Screen Safety And Suitability Solution For Google's Search Partner Network (SPN)
articles.summary: DoubleVerify (DV) has launched AI-powered pre-bid controls for Google's Search Partner Network (SPN). This new product offers advertisers enhanced brand safety and suitability protections across SPN inventory, enabling them to avoid unsuitable content and improve their advertising ROI. The AI-powered feature automates inventory classification and avoidance, increasing operational efficiency for advertisers.

articles.title: How Small Language Models Deliver Big Business Benefits
articles.author: SAP Guest
articles.summary: Small Language Models (SLMs) can be used to generate product descriptions. At larger organizations, multiple SLMs handle business-unit-specific tasks such as analyzing consumer feedback and social media posts to guide new product development. SAP's AI chief strategy officer suggests businesses pick the model that's right for embedded use case.

articles.title: Say hello to one of the most niche PS5 controllers you'll see this year
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Thrustmaster is launching the SimTask FarmStick PlayStation, a new product designed to enhance the farming gaming experience on the PS5 console.

articles.title: Hogwarts Legacy will get a major visual boost on Nintendo Switch 2 thanks to Nvidia's ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo will release the Nintendo Switch 2 to consumers on June 5. Visual and performance expectations are already available for one of its games.

articles.title: Samsung's Tri-Fold Phone Tipped to Use Silicon-Carbon Battery
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its first tri-fold phone, potentially named the Samsung G Fold. The unveiling was teased during the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event in January.

articles.title: Nutella launching new spread that will be made in suburban Chicago
articles.author: Chicago Tribune
articles.summary: Nutella is launching Nutella Peanut, a new version of its hazelnut spread, marking the first such product innovation in the company's 60-year history. This product is set to roll out soon.

articles.title: Slideshow: New products from The Kraft Heinz Co., 3pm, LLC and Ferrero North America
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: New snack products are entering the market category, signaling the introduction of new items within the food sector.

articles.title: Fark Weird News Quiz - May 9, 2025 (Hard Version)
articles.summary: Gucci has launched Gucci Guilty Parfum Pour Homme, a men's fragrance featuring French Lavandin Abrialis, Lemon Sfumatrice, Juniper, Spanish Cistus, Orange Flower, Nutmeg, Indonesian Patchouli, Dry Woods, and Musks. The fragrance comes in a dark anthracite metallized bottle without a spray cap and sells for $150.
